.
s
.
<p>s</p>
.

.
some -!justified text!- in a paragraph
.
<p>some <div class="text-justify">justified text</div> in a paragraph</p>
.

.
bold and -!**justified text**!- in a paragraph
.
<p>bold and <div class="text-justify"><strong>justified text</strong></div> in a paragraph</p>
.

.
bold and **-!justified text!-** in a paragraph
.
<p>bold and <strong><div class="text-justify">justified text</div></strong> in a paragraph</p>
.


.
clearly not a -!justified text definition
.
<p>clearly not a -!justified text definition</p>
.

.
more text that is not justified!-
.
<p>more text that is not justified!-</p>
.

.
## -!Justified heading!-
.
<h2><div class="text-justify">Justified heading</div></h2>
.

coverage
.
*~f
.
<p>*~f</p>
.

remove icon
